sensor.title: Orientation sensor detected!
sensor.text: It looks like your device has support for orientation sensor. Musicorum Rewind also has support for it on some parallax animations.
sensor.text2: But this can slow down performance on some devices. You can disable it here or later on the settings!
sensor.tip: If you have slow performance, try closing external tabs/apps.

loading.title: We found out a past rewind.
loading.text: You already used Musicorum Rewind at <0>{{date}}</0>
loading.loadingSubText: Sit down while we analyze your entire year on music...

texts.5: Taking a look at your most listened artists of the year...
texts.6: Taking a look at your most listened albums of the year...
texts.7: Taking a look at your most listened tracks of the year...
texts.8: Tuning in to your favorite songs...
texts.9: Taking a deeper look on your most played songs...
texts.10: Cross matching data... This may take a while. Please be patient.

beginning.title: THE BEGINNING
beginning.subTitle: This was your first scrobble of <0>2020</0>

scrobbleCount.text: is how many scrobbles you had this year

favorites.text: is how many tracks you loved this year

tags.title: TOP TAGS
tags.subTitle: These are your most listened tags, A.K.A. genres
tags.notice: This chart is based on your top 100 tracks, and then isolating the first 6.

mainstream.popular: was your most popular artist, with <0>{{popularity}}%</0> popularity
mainstream.least: was your least popular artist, with <0>{{popularity}}%</0> popularity
mainstream.text: is how much mainstream you were *
mainstream.notice: * Based on an average of your top 100 artists' popularity from Spotify

analysis.text: is how positive your songs were *
analysis.notice: * Based on an average of your top 100 tracks' valence analysis from Spotify

playlist.title: Save your whole year in a single playlist!

imageShare.title: Share your rewind!
imageShare.text: Before we end, take a souvenir from this year's rewind!

ending.title: The end!
ending.text1: Well, and that was your year on music! We hope you liked this new experience.
ending.text2: This website was developed by one person with no financial return. If you like this idea and want to see more in the future, please consider becoming a patron, or consider sharing it and giving us a feedback :)
ending.text3: We hope to see you next year! Happy 2021!
ending.tweet: Come take a look at your year in music from lastfm, by @{{user}}
ending.creditsText: Here are some credits to all the people who helped to build Musicorum Rewind 2020

albumMeme.text: i love this album more than i love my life
